body_html:
@arassadin AFAIK convert_variables_to_constants is not sufficient to freeze the graph. See https://www.tensorflow.org/extend/tool_developers/#freezing
Also TensorRT 4 will have a better op support and mobilenet support will improve when we switch to TRT4.
body_text:
@arassadin AFAIK convert_variables_to_constants is not sufficient to freeze the graph. See https://www.tensorflow.org/extend/tool_developers/#freezing
Also TensorRT 4 will have a better op support and mobilenet support will improve when we switch to TRT4.
body:
@arassadin AFAIK convert_variables_to_constants is not sufficient to freeze the graph. See https://www.tensorflow.org/extend/tool_developers/#freezing
Also TensorRT 4 will have a better op support and mobilenet support will improve when we switch to TRT4.
